name: Suikan Quest
description:
Cynthia visits Termina city on a certain mission.
However, she is spiked with a meal by an inn master
and trained into a lewd slut...

An RPG that asks you to solve puzzles and collect event CGs.
There are no battles elements in this game.
Mainly Sleep Violations, with a few of Prostitution / Glory Hole / Being Pet
* 21 base CGs. 100 incl. variations
